recommender

Class BaseRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • recommender.BaseRecommender
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FunkSVDRecommender, IICollaborativeFiltering, SlopeOneRecommender, UUCollaborativeFiltering

    public class BaseRecommender
extends java.lang.Object
    It is the base class that each recommender class must extend. It provides implementation for evaluating a given recommender algorithm on the test set. By itself, it returns a user's mean rating as a prediction for any item for that user.

    • Method Detail

      • ceilPrediction

        protected double ceilPrediction(double prediction)
        Parameters:
        prediction - a double value representing a predicted rating
        Returns:
        prediction clipped to the interval [1.0, 5.0]

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate(java.lang.String predictionFileName)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Evaluate the performance of the recommender over the test data set and compute performance statistics.
        Parameters:
        predictionFileName - The output file where predicted outputs for test data set will be stored as [user item actual_rating predicted_rating] tuples
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if @predictionFileName cannot be opened for writing or written to.

      • predict

        public double predict(int user,
             int item)
        Each inheriting recommender algorithm will override this method.
        Returns:
        the predicted rating that @user will assign to @item, which in case of BaseRecommender is the mean rating of @user.

      • train

        public void train()
        Each inheriting recommender algorithm will override this method to learn from the training dataset.
